overview:
Technology System Integrator your source for IT solutions, we focus solely on embracing our clientâ€™s networking, application and technology needs. Helping organizations across all industry to achieve their business goals and objectives by lowering the cost and maximizing the performance of their information technology systems.

Technology System Integrator (TSI) specializes in the design, configuration, implementation and network management of local and wide area network (LAN/WAN) solutions.

* We have the experience

We bring to each project insights and knowledge that has been gained from our over 28 years of working in the Information Technology industry.

Technology System Integrator (TSI) assists in the design, implementation and support of our client’s technology programs. Our clients range from small single building entities to large county based systems interconnected by wide-area network connections.

At Technology System Integrator (TSI), we do not simply install your equipment and then walk away. As a detail oriented company, our mission is to build a long-term relationship with our clients as we assist them in solving their technology needs and offering out client’s Network management services.

Service areas in the New York Metro region include Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, Bronx, Staten Island, New Jersey and Long Island.

Tech Support, Help Desk, Network Support, Computer Services, Network Security

Technology System Integrator - New York Tech Support, IT and Computer tech support in Manhattan, New York City.

A unique IT solutions provider for business and technical services including the following: Technology consulting, Web site design and development, Application and database design, Network support, analysis, and design, eMail systems implementation, eCommerce and integration services, Thin client services, Remote management, and Remote access.
